site_search.description: Configure the Site Search capabilities, built into the site using Optimizely Graph, Optimizely Data Platform and Optimizely Content Recommendations

recent_search_count.description: The number of recent search terms to show

show_recent_searches.description: Show the list of recent search terms, requires Data Platform

use_personalization.description: Use the top topic from Optimizely Content Recommendations to personalize the search results

interest_boost.description: The weight to be applied to the topics retrieved from Optimizely Content Recommendations for a personalized search result

layout_configuration.description: Test various layout configurations to determine the best possible layout

logo.description: The URL/Path to the logo file to use

theme_switcher.description: Enable/disable the theme switcher, when disabled it forces the site to follow system settings.
